vehicles.description: Large truck occupying the lane directly in front of the ego car, moving in the same direction
vehicles.explanation: The presence of this large truck impacts the ego car's visibility and maneuverability, potentially requiring a lane change to overtake the truck safely.

general_perception.description and explanation: In the traffic image, there is a large truck occupying the lane directly in front of the ego car, moving in the same direction. The presence of this large truck impacts the ego car's visibility and maneuverability, potentially requiring a lane change to overtake the truck safely.

1.description and explanation: This large vehicle is equipped with specialized machinery, commonly seen in construction and maintenance scenarios on roads. Due to its size and the type of load it carries, this vehicle often moves slower than standard traffic, potentially requiring vehicles behind it, including the ego car, to reduce speed and maintain a greater following distance to accommodate sudden stops or reduced speeds.

driving_suggestion: Recommend maintaining a safe following distance behind the truck and preparing to change lanes if it is safe to do so, in order to pass the truck and regain clear visibility ahead.
